section.title: Loading Bitmaps and Drawables
section.para: Android allows you to use the Bitmap class for working with bitmaps. This section explain how to create Bitmap objects via Java code and how to convert Bitmap into Drawable objects and vice versa.
If required you can load any accessible bitmap file in your code and convert them into Drawables objects.
